example: The black cat is old.
There are a lot of bridges across the river Thames.
She and her husband have already gone.
A waiter brought me a glass of water.
I have been to the supermarket today.
It rains a lot in England.
It is warm today because the sun is shining.
Can I help you?
She said that she is tired. That is a shame.
It is sunny today. I don't have my hat, I wish I had it.
This is Tom, he is my brother.
It was cold yesterday.
These flowers are for you.
He is sitting on my chair.
We are married, and we are happy together.
He closed the door behind him as he entered the room.
She has gone to the cinema with her friends.
He showed me his new football.
I am going to see my grandparents, as they are both very old.
I am proud of myself.
We had lunch at 2 o'clock. We ate at a lovely restaurant.
You will be cold. ("I was cold." "We are cold." "She is cold.")
This is my new coat, I bought it earlier this week.
I have had some cake, so I will not have any more.
We got the train from London to Manchester, I had to travel from 11 am until 1 pm.
